title: NFC suddenly not working in my Pixel 4 XL
content:
My last time nfc usage was 1 week ago in Google Pay, everything was fine. Untill today NFC suddenly doesn't work.

I have try different app include google pay and the problem still exists so it is not a particular app issue. 

Tried Safe mode and doesn't work either. Dont want to factory reset my phone at this moment so I hope someone can give me a hand on this.

I guess is the recent system update that caused this problem? The Feb 2020 update.
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 4 XL
